subject: Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: The credibility of FIFA is be on the line as it investigates whether two officials offered to sell their votes in the balloting for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
snippet: The credibility of FIFA is be on the line as it investigates whether two officials offered to sell their votes in the balloting for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
